TopicTitle: [Video] I'm Scott Manley and These Are My Kerbal Space Program Videos

Articles.Content: Can any of you be online? (July 12th 2014 8:22 PM)

Scott,

I've been watching your videos for a while and while I know you can't make a video for every request but I was wondering if you would do a "science" video on the privatization of space. Mostly I am curious if you would touch base a little deeper than the surface articles CNN does on stuff like (feel free to pick others this is just an idea):

LOIRP and the new (old from 1966) photos of the moon (http://www.cnn.com/2014/07/30/world/hackers-nasa-lunar-photos/index.html?hpt=hp_c3).

ISEE-3/ICE (http://xkcd.com/1337/ and http://www.planetary.org/blogs/emily-lakdawalla/2014/02070836-isee-3.html)

I hate to sound overly enthusiastic, but it seems that the public might just be *interested* in space again, and honestly we have KSP and you to thank quite largely for that.

I'd just like to give you a huge thank you for all that you have done.

Brain75

HUllo!

Sorry I've been on vacation in Europe for 2 weeks so I haven't had much time to keep up to date with things - but - I did visit Skycorp at McMoons a couple of months ago

- ISEE-3 Reboot

- LOIRP
